overview:
Mike is a co-host of the popular development podcast devcasting.com and a sought after speaker because of his extensive development expertise and background. He was a member of the notorious OpenCola team and has served as CTO of Kamelio, Interim-CEO of Cinematica and lectured at McKenzie College.

He is incredibly passionate about collaborative development and sharing his expertise with like-minded technology aficionados. Mike maintained his own consultancy firm prior to joining TrustMe as the core architect of our API and CTO.
